medical_history.chief_complaint: Sharp, stabbing midepigastric pain radiating to the back and shoulders.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient woke up this morning with pain of significant intensity, endorsing intermittent nausea and emesis. The patient has had similar episodes in the past. Patient admits to eating more fatty foods recently.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of DVT/PE, mild allergy-induced asthma.
